Breaking news

Judge rejects request to delay 'Whitey' Bulger trial 4:03 PM

Belichick: Tebow will do whatever is best for team

Bill Belichick, in his usual demure tone, deflected question after question about the use of his new quarterback, Tim Tebow, in his first press conference in more than a month and a half. "He's a talented player, who's smart and who works hard," Belichick said.
